text: I IS VIO Sl Pivoting Clicker 15: GEPP Assuming that the given matrix is nonsingular, answer the question: are the entries of L bounded by 1 in absolute value? @ with pivoting can’t determine; without pivoting never @ with pivoting never; without pivoting never @ with pivoting yes; without pivoting yes @ with pivoting yes; without pivoting never @ with pivoting yes; without pivoting can’t determine Ascher & Greif (UBC Computer Science) A First Course in Numerical Methods CPSC 302, Fall 2023 32/48 Your Answer: E
